name: aboporu-lang
description: An exoteric language made for fun

scripts.generate: node index.js -p ./examples/SimpleHelloWorld.abapl -o ./examples/outputs/HelloWorld; node index.js -p ./examples/BlockHelloWorld.abapl -o ./examples/outputs/BlockHelloWorld; node index.js -p ./examples/LoopsHelloWorld.abapl -o ./examples/outputs/LoopsHelloWorld; node index.js -p ./examples/BlocksAndLoops.abapl -o ./examples/outputs/BlocksAndLoops

author: Augusto Sigolo
